description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Civil War on the Border. A narrative of operations in Missouri, Kansas, Arkansas, and the Indian Territory during the years 1861-62 (1863-65), based upon the official reports ... Second edition, revised. [With portraits and maps.]" Author: BRITTON, Wiley. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9615.dd.9." Volume: 02 Page: 119 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1891 Publisher: G. P. Putnam's Sons Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000479810 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
